overview: John Mayer at Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on September 21, 2013. Setlist: 1 - No Such Thing  2 - Wildfire  3 - Queen of California  4 - I Don't Trust Myself  5 - Half of My Heart  6 - Slow Dancing in a Burning Room  7 - Daughters  8 - Neon  9 - Your Body Is a Wonderland  10 - Waiting on the World to Change  11 - Dear Marie  12 - Stop This Train  13 - Why Georgia  14 - Gravity
title: John Mayer: Rock In Rio 2013
